sentences.en: A wide range of hotel, motel and apartment accommodation is available in most cities, major resorts and many rural areas.
sentences.cn: 在大部分城市、主要旅游点和许多农村地区，都能找到各种类型的旅馆、汽车旅馆和公寓住所。

sentences.en: He put Elizabeth's motel bill and airfare on his expense account.
sentences.cn: 他将伊丽莎白住汽车旅馆的费用和机票费用记在他的报销账目中。

sentences.en: He took off at once and headed back to the motel.
sentences.cn: 他立刻离开，回到汽车旅馆。

sentences.en: His abhorrence of racism led him to write The Algiers Motel Incident.
sentences.cn: 对种族主义的憎恨促使他写了《阿尔及尔汽车旅馆事件》一书。

sentences.en: I also have to get back to the motel. The manager took my passport last night, and now he and the passport are nowhere to be found.
sentences.cn: 我也必须回到汽车旅馆去，因为旅馆经理昨天晚上拿走了我的护照，到现在为止他本人和我的护照都不知所踪。

sentences.en: It was vital that he swallowed the story about Juanita being in that motel room that night.
sentences.cn: 关键是他对朱厄妮塔那晚住在那个汽车旅馆房间里一事毫不怀疑。

sentences.en: Late that night he landed at a motel.
sentences.cn: 那晚他到了一家汽车旅馆.

sentences.en: Motel owners and restaurant managers copped it for neglecting their clients.
sentences.cn: 汽车旅馆老板和饭店经理因为冷落顾客而受到责骂。

sentences.en: Over breakfast at my motel, I fell into conversation with the owner of a hardware shop.
sentences.cn: 我在汽车旅店吃早饭时，和一位五金店的老板聊了起来。

sentences.en: She found a small, inexpensive motel on the outskirts of the town; it was barren and unlovely.
sentences.cn: 她在城郊找了一家便宜的小汽车旅馆，那旅馆既简陋又难看。

sentences.en: Should I go back to the motel and wait for you to telephone?
sentences.cn: 我要回汽车旅馆等你电话吗？

sentences.en: Stay at a cheap motel.
sentences.cn: 住便宜的汽车旅馆。

sentences.en: Straight ahead were the low cabins of the motel.
sentences.cn: 正前方就是汽车旅馆的低矮小木屋。

sentences.en: The gas station just neighbours to the motel.
sentences.cn: 加油站就在汽车旅馆的附近。

sentences.en: The hotels are full up, and the guests have had to go to this dinky little motel way out on Stewart Avenue.
sentences.cn: 宾馆已经客满了，客人们不得不到斯图尔特街上这家偏远的小汽车旅馆里来。

sentences.en: The motel manager showed the guests to their room.
sentences.cn: 汽车旅馆经理把旅客领到他们房间.

sentences.en: The sign outside the motel said " No Vacancies ".
sentences.cn: 汽车旅馆外的招牌显示 “ 客满 ”.

sentences.en: The word motel was created by combining motor and hotel.
sentences.cn: 汽车旅馆一词是由“汽车”和“旅馆”两个词合成的.

sentences.en: They went down the corridor toward the front of the motel.
sentences.cn: 他们顺着走廊向汽车旅馆的正门走去.

sentences.en: We can stay in a motel overnight, then continue on to Copenhagen tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 我们可以在一家汽车旅馆过夜，然后明天再继续出发到哥本哈根。

trans.tran_en: a hotel for people who are travelling by car, where you can park your car outside your room
